Walkability Data

This dataset represents BEH’s Walkability Measure by NYC DCP Census Tract (2010).

  • Census Tract (2010)

    • Walkability Tables

      • Download BEH Walkability CSV
      • View BEH Walkability Table in Browser

    • GIS Shapefiles

      • Download the joined Walkability Data and the NYC 2010 Tracts in CartoDB as Shapefile, KML, SVG, GeoJSON or with API

      • NYC Department of City Planning 2010 Census Tracts (Clipped to Shoreline) Shapefile Note: NYC DCP’s Tract file has 2,166 Tracts, our BEH dataset uses 2,164. The two missing tracts are water/piers. Drop them from the Tracts shapefile.

    • Data Dictionary

      • Download Data Dictionary

  • Community District

    • Walkability Tables

      • Download BEH Walkability CSV
      • View BEH Walkability Table in Browser

    • GIS Shapefiles

      • NYC Department of City Planning Community Districts Shapefile

    • Data Dictionary

      • Download Data Dictionary

  • UHF (42) (2009)

    • Walkability Tables

      • Download BEH Walkability CSV
      • View BEH Walkability Table in Browser

    • GIS Shapefiles

      • NYC DOHMH UHF 42 Shapefile

    • Data Dictionary

      • Download Data Dictionary

Top

Tree Canopy Data

This dataset represents the percent of the NYC DCP Census Tract (2010) covered by Tree Canopy.

  • Census Tract (2010)

    • Tree Canopy Tables

      • Download BEH Tree Canopy CSV
      • View BEH Tree Canopy Table in Browser
    • GIS Shapefiles

      • Download the joined Tree Canopy Data and the NYC 2010 Tracts in CartoDB as Shapefile, KML, SVG, GeoJSON or with API

      • NYC Department of City Planning 2010 Census Tracts (Clipped to Shoreline) Shapefile

    • Data Dictionary

      Coming soon.

Top

Alcohol License Data

This dataset represents count of Alcohol Licenses by NYC DCP Census Tract (2010) which BEH received via email 2013/04/21 from NY State Liquor Authority.

  • License Categories
    • 1 = On Premise
    • 2 = Off Premise
    • 3 = Wholesale
    • 4 = Pending
    • 5 = Disabled

  • Census Tract (2010)

    • Alcohol License Tables

      • Download Alcohol License Data CSV
      • View Alcohol License Table in Browser
    • GIS Shapefiles

      • Download the joined Alcohol License Data and the NYC 2010 Tracts in CartoDB as Shapefile, KML, SVG, GeoJSON or with API

      • NYC Department of City Planning 2010 Census Tracts (Clipped to Shoreline) Shapefile

    • Data Dictionary

      Coming soon.

Top

US Census American Community Survey Data 2006-2010

This dataset represents US Census American Community Survey Data 2006-2010 by NYC DCP Census Tract (2010).

  • Census Tract (2010)

    • US Census American Community Survey Data 2006-2010 Tables

      • Download US Census American Community Survey Data 2006-2010 CSV

    • GIS Shapefiles

      • NYC Department of City Planning 2010 Census Tracts (Clipped to Shoreline) Shapefile

    • Data Dictionary

      • Download Data Dictionary

Top

BEH US Census Data API Download Tool (beta 0.1)

Download US Census Data to JSON via the BEH Census Data API Download Tool

This tool is only available for the following Census Geography levels:

  • Census Tract

This tool is only available for the following Census Variables:

  • Total Population (or estimate for ACS)

Note: This tool is currently in development so please report bugs or issues.

JSON File Format Resources:

  • JSON.org
  • Using JSON in R
  • Using JSON in Python

Geographic Information Systems (GIS) Data Portal for the Built Environment and Health (BEH) Research Group at Columbia University.
